# Septical

**SEP'TICAL**,

**1.** Having power to promote putrefacation. Many experiments were made by Sir John Pringle to ascertain the _septic_ and _anteseptic_ virtues of natural bodies.

**2.** Proceeding from or generated by putrefaction; as _septic_ acid.

**SEP'TIC**, _noun_ A substance that promotes the putrefaction of bodies.
